## Monthly Electriciy Consumption in Australia

## The goal of this prject is to come up with an adequate time-series model to forecast future monthly electricity consumption


```
electricity <- data$Electricy
date <- as.Date(data$Date, format = '%Y.%m.%d')

par(mfrow=c(2,1))
plot(date, electricity, xlab = 'Year', ylab = 'Electricity', type = 'l', main = 'Montly Electricity')
acf(electricity, main = 'Sample ACF of Monthly Electricity')
```

```{r data, echo=FALSE}
par(mfrow=c(2,1))
plot(date, electricity, xlab = 'Year', ylab = 'Electricity', type = 'l', main = 'Montly Electricity')
acf(electricity, main = 'Sample ACF of Monthly Electricity')
```
